MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY12 area of Dunfermline, affecting properties in Bruce Street and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3:15pm due to third party damage to our underground electricity network on High Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:37pm on Sunday, 14 February 2021
